jobDescription: Everest Insurance, a member of the Everest Re Group, Ltd. is currently recruiting for Actuarial Predictive Modeler/Data Scientist in our growing Insurance Operation. This position location is flexible as it can either be based out of our corporate headquarters in Liberty Corner, NJ (exit 33 off I-78) or our Midtown Manhattan office.
